input_args.*: ['3a2eca67ae9c64320babfd5eb1d87ccc331c55e6bc647ad0786d5dc28b2f3c7d', 'Does the response "Yes, we do have a sizing guide. Please refer to our Fit Guide and Size Charts here: https://shop.lululemon.com/help/size-guide/mens. For lettered sizes, use the waist and hip measurements as a guide to pick the right size for you. For numbered sizes, our pants fit like your favorite chinos. If you’re a 32 in the pants you have at home, you’ll likely be a 32 in our pants. Bodies come in all shapes and sizes. Normally we select bottom sizes based off our waist size." accurately address the query "Do you have a sizing guide that I can follow"?', 2]
